item.description:
Hi ALL...

Since I've received many.... requests for an early morning breakfast to be tossed into the mix.... This one's for you :] for all those early risers. This will be our first ever Sunday breakfast!!! This should make some people very happy :0) Let's meet at 8:00AM on March 8th at:

South Street Diner
178 Kneeland St
Boston, MA 02111
(617) 350-0028
Price: Very Reasonable
southstreetdiner.com (check them out on the web)

This is no doubt the coolest diner in the city. It's old and a real classic. It's also the only 24hr diner in all of the city :[ The food is great and the staff awesome. I just love their milk shakes, too!!!

I hope to see you at the South Street Diner!

Cheers,
Michael
PS- at 8AM we'll be able to take over the place :]
item.how_to_find_us: Reservation will be under Mike/Meet up

group.name: Brunch & More (20/30-Somethings for brunch & more, etc...)

item.name: Our First Breakfast!!! (just to mix it up for all you early risers).
